website_summaries.verdict: A modern-looking futon-style sleeper that can be positioned in several ways. We just wish the cushioning were a bit more supportive.
pros: We love this model's split design that allows owners to fold it multiple ways for different sleeping and sitting positions
Slim build fits well in small rooms
cons: Some assembly is required, but it's not overly challenging to put together
Cushions tend to sag with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Short term couch only. Great at first but fades quickly.
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* Upon purchasing this futon in October of 2017 it was the ideal couch for me. However after only 7 months of owning it, the cushions are completely shot and sunk in. I’m 5’5 and definitely not a heavy girl at all. This couch has gotten minimal use in the last 7 months and I’m super disappointed it didn’t hold up. I at least expected it to last a year before starting to sink in and become uncomfortable. I’m already looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The couch in general feels like I might fall through it
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much because the couch is so affordable, so I guess you get what you pay for. You can definitely feel the frame through the seat, I purchased this in hopes that I could have 2 guests sleep on it, but I'm a little wary that it would be able to support them throughout the night– the legs that come out of the backrest in sleeper mode seem a bit flimsy. The couch in general feels like I might fall through it... That being said, it's pretty cute and beats an Ikea couch for the same price. It's lightweight and easy to assemble, which was what I was looking for because I anticipate moving in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Joicr

customer_reviews.title: It's a good looking but not really comfortable affordable futon
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking futon but it's definitely not as comfortable. The cushions are kind of light, meaning they are not as dense as I thought they would be, so when you sit and lay down (lay down especially) you can totally feel all the wooden pieces inside that make the skeleton of the futon. Otherwise, it's just a nice hip looking futon. If you have the chance and stuff the pillows with more foam or put some blankets over the seats, then do it for sure. I will have to get a foam topper if I will have guests sleeping over. Otherwise I would suggest the floor before I suggest to sleep on the futon.
customer_reviews.author: Anie

customer_reviews.title: I love this sofa
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa! Beautiful color it give a nice touch to my place, great quality and excellent price! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews on this and they were very close to our experience. Very firm, but that is what I was looking for to use in a home office. Color is perfect. Matches the color easily in a throw we have and some pillows I picked up. Had someone sleep on it with no complaints for one night. Did I say it was firm? Also, I am 5'4" and often couches are too high where I cannot put my feet flat on the ground and/or I cannot sit back because the seat depth is too deep. This was great for me. My 6'2" son likes it too. We do not sit on it for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Tigges

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Great look. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got the gray version, and have been surprisingly happy with this purchase. It was straight-forward to put together, and easily folds down to futon/large chaise mode (upzips in each back half, and you flip out a small leg base before folding each back down). The diagonal stitching pattern adds nice flair, and the gray-specks-with-white material almost has a tweed-like or heathered gray look. I’m really digging the look of it. It has a springiness to it when you sit or lay on it, but you can’t feel the springs. I think it’s pretty comfortable overall, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenally Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Living proof that one should never buy furniture without being able to try it out. This is the single most uncomfortable piece of furniture I have ever owned. I know that sounds extreme but it is true. I’ve even tried adding stuffing to it. It’s that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Shreves

customer_reviews.title: looks very nice and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this futon. It doesnt even look like a futon! It looks like a sofa. It is not the most comfortable sofa in the world but does the work. It looks very modern and does not look cheap. It was very easy to assemble. We've had it for 3 months now, we have not used it as a bed but I will put a plush mattress cover for it to be more comfortable when using it to sleep. I accidentally droped a bit of red wine on it and it was easy to clean. I would recommend this futon if you are on budget and want to decorate nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Qual
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for it to arrive, but I expected longer shipping due to Covid. Once it showed up, it was like Christmas in my house. It took 15 minutes to assemble and all the pieces and tools were included, zipped in the couch. The color is beautiful. The fabric will hide any potential stains or kitty scratches. My 6’1” husband can lay flat armrest to armrest. The couch IS firm. We like it, it’s super comfy for us. And it has softened a bit from sitting on it. There’s also a 600lb weight limit so this thing is solid. Love it. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color but I threw this couch/futon away after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Good things: The color is trendy and it arrives quickly. The price is unbeatable. I think it would be great for a dorm. Reason for 2 stars: It was very difficult to put together and you need 2 people, it is so uncomfortable that I didn't want to sit on it. I weigh 150 and my dog weighs 18 pounds but when we sat on it for 30 minutes or more, it sagged where we sat. It also was very creaky. It was too difficult to return so I just threw it away. I tried giving it away but no one wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Audio file devouress

customer_reviews.title: Light and apartment friendly
customer_reviews.text: I went from a 200+ pound 2 seat recliner to this and I'm glad I did. My apartment has much more room as well as significantly more versatile with it turning into a small futon. I'm 6'1 190lbs and I fit fine, but it will flip when the back is down and I lay on that side. Lack of support when in futon mode. It's springy in the seat and padded in the back, but don't expect your $800 couch feel. I haven't had anyone complain (maybe they are really nice?) But my 5 year old claims it as his couch/bed. Since I got this he has abandoned his expensive bed for this couch. I kinda want another one :x
customer_reviews.author: Fozzie

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Fabric!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this couch for a couple of years now and the Fabric has held up perfectly. We have two small children that bounce, drool and spill on this couch. It is very easy to clean and hides any sort of staining very well! The only complaint is that I can kind of start to feel the interior framing now, like the padding has shifted or flattened. Not terrible though. It’s been a great couch!
customer_reviews.author: k Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my sons room for seating and sleep space. Has worked out great, kids love it. It’s stylish, been durable for its intended use, and easy to put together! Did not have a strong smell to it like some products do, so that’s a bonus. Very happy with it, and the product company (I bought another/different one of theirs for my home office). It’s not luxurious, they are firm, but great product at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Receiving this package was a unique experience. The box the futon arrived in looked as if it had been mutilated by a rabid wolf. However, upon allowing what was left if the cardboard box to fall off, I was astonished to see the futon was fine for the most part. BUT the box with screws and instructions was mangled. After sorting everything out, we discovered that we were missing some screws to put the couch together. Luckily I have spare screws and washers lying around so that wasn't a problem for me, but others might not be as lucky. Once we finished putting the futon together it was great. It's comfortable, reliable, and very modern.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish But Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: So, this is a *really* attractive futon and I'm honestly just upset that it's so darn uncomfortable. Think waiting room seats uncomfortable. I bought this as a bed alternative in a room that doubles as an office space and you can feel the wood frame through the "cushions." It's a decent price if you're just looking for some good-looking seating, but definitely not for sleeping on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: or better yet, a deep socket wrench
customer_reviews.text: this couch was a real pain to put together. if you have different wrenches, or better yet, a deep socket wrench, it will make assembly a breeze. The little tools they included made this assembly a real pain in the butt. However, once together, this thing is a beauty! It looks a lot nicer than what you are paying and its not the softest couch, but I find no problem getting comfortable on it. If you like a firm mattress, you'll probably be ok with this couch. I have slept on it as a futon once and it was not bad at all - definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: erich j olsen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and can seat 4 easily
customer_reviews.text: My wife and two kids can sit with me on the couch and we all fit. It feels study enough and the folding back in two sections is nice. Others have said the cushions are like concrete, and I would have to strongly disagree. While they aren't like sitting on a cloud, they have plenty of softness with support underneath. For the price, I would buy another if I needed to. Overall very happy so far with this futon/couch!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Artinger

customer_reviews.title: For the occasional overnight guest
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the picture. It was easy to assemble. However, it sits low and feels like sitting on cardboard and springs. I bought it to sit and sleep on for about 3 months...didn't last a month until I had.to go out and buy a full size memory foam mattress topper to add softness. At month 2 I ended up.buying a bed. I will still keep it in my guest room for the occastional overnight guest, but I will definitely keep the mattress topper for it as well! I do like the fact that it looks more like a couch than a futon...but don't buy as your main sitting/sleeping piece.
customer_reviews.author: Naturalknots

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous look and quality product for price
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that had issues assembling this clearly is not the brightest cookie in the jar. This is gorgeous and extremely easy to put together. The cushions are stiff but I’m not sure what people expect for $250. I bought this for an extra place for someone to sleep in my office and it is perfect. I will purchase a cheap mattress topper to go on top for sleeping but for occasional seating, it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Shevonne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I just moved into a new place and wanted a cheap sleeper sofa. I would say it's about what you'd expect for the price. It's not the most comfortable thing in the world but it's comfortable enough for us to hang out on. I don't see a guest wanting to sleep on it for more than a few nights, but that's fine. It was quite easy and straightforward to assemble. My one gripe is that the arm rests are really wobbly, definitely can't sit on them or anything. There are worse things though. Other than that it feels pretty sturdy. If you want a cheap sleeper sofa, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: T Williams

customer_reviews.title: It was better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look, feel & comfort of the futon couch. I am confused as to how the back of the couch props ups by itself? Do I have to lean it against the wall? I hope not. The back does adjust to recline & lay flat, they just don't stay up by themselves. That part isn't cool. Otherwise one person can put this together. You just have to take your time & be careful. I'd like to add a retraction...after playing with it, it does prop itself up at the inclines given. I now give this a 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Beware... You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sofa bed on 2/15/19. The filling of the seat got bunched up and cant sit comfortable. Besides, it looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: CWong

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October 2018. The perfect size and look for my micro studio. Okay to sit on, but, omg, horrible to sleep on! Thinking of buying a memory foam topper to use at night, or just might eventually go for the traditional futon/sofa. Would have just given 5 stars for the looks alone, but, nah, my body hurts too much from sleeping on it for the past 4 months...
customer_reviews.author: SJMcM

customer_reviews.title: Good looks but not for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: looks good, thats why I bought it. I wasn't expecting it to be super durable when I got it. I only use it once in a while and for the most part its just there for looks. If you need something that you will use daily, this is not it. It will wear down quickly from daily use. Mine still looks good but I don't use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Sidz

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a safety hazard for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: It's a very uncomfortable seat, I haven't slept on it but I can't imagine it'll be an enjoyable experience. Just laying down on it was enough to make me send it back, it immediately tips over when you roll to toward the back side of the chair. The color doesn't appear to be a true grey either, has more a blue tint to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to assemble. Not something you want to sit on all day but the dogs enjoy lounging on it in during the afternoon. I have a puppy that is a digger and the fabric has held up very well, no snags or loose fibers. The springs are a bit uncomfortable after a while of sitting. Not a bad comfortable sofa for checking email but you wouldn't want to buy binge watch Netflix on this all weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson & Destiny Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult for me to pick a Futon sofa that wasn't too expensive and a color I would like. But this black one fit the bill and it looks pretty sharp with a white shag rug under it. The room is a soft med shade blue and a color difficult to find something that wouldn't fight my blue. I love it. It is comfortable for me because I'm not a big person.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthanne Peters

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This is THE worst item I've purchased. This bed/couch thing is squeaky, uncomfortable, the fill is non-existent, and I'm not a huge fan of having springs poking out and stabbing me in the back. This was a brand new item, but has the comfort-level of a cactus. I requested a replacement, but this item is no longer in stock. Wow, I wonder why. Go elsewhere. Seller would not replace, even though the listing is still active with available inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Gulyansky

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Kind of wish it were better quality though. I’ve had it for a couple months now and you can already see where we sit on it and we aren’t heavy people. Also, the arms are as tight as I can get them and they still seem a little bendy. This is cute so if it doesn’t get worse in the next year or so, we will probably use it more for a decoration piece so it can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. 15 minutes from unboxing to laying down to watch baseball. Added a gel mattress pad to get comfortable in the bed mode, but was quite comfortable just sitting sideways in normal couch position. If you’re over 6ft tall, you’re not going to be able to fully stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: JPC3481

customer_reviews.title: Great couch with easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great futon! Looks slick and modern. Super easy to set up and the tools are provided for you under the couch in the zipper compartment. They packaged the tools very well and it was nice to know that the boxes were labeled as well! When paired with a topper, it's just like a real bed! I'm 5' 7" and i just fit it.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Futon looks great but the cushions were comfortable for less than a year before the foam broke down. Seating is lumpy and I can feel the springs beneath the cloth. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Talk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This product looks excellent in person. I was worried it would feel cheap, but it actually seems very sturdy and well made. I have used this as my primary couch for 2 months and it's holding up very well. Probably not a great sleeper sofa; it's a shade hard and rather short, but it would definitely work in a pinch. I was able to put it together alone in roughly 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Futon Couch Bed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our office and it is perfection! It looks so much more expensive than it is priced. The back is adjustable so that it can recline, sit up straight and go completely flat when being used for a bed. Took all of 10 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: claudia rimoli

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable couch/futon I have ever owned in my whole life!!!!!! I very seldom even sit on it now because after I get up my back hurts so badly I cam barely walk. I absolutely do not recommend this at all! If I could rate it a negetive star amount I would.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Ballard and Fam

customer_reviews.title: Looks Killer
customer_reviews.text: it looks SUPER good for the price. Not the most comfortable thing in the world, but when it looks this good and costs this little, that's kinda to be expected. the middle legs were brown on mine!
customer_reviews.author: tim oneill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Great playroom couch! Our kids got this for their playroom and they love it! It is a great size and nice quality. However, it is not super comfortable for adults and I wouldn’t recommend it as a main couch. Our kids love that it folds into a futon and they sleep on it almost every weekend. It’s a perfect size for little kids. Can’t imagine an adult sleeping on it. My husband and I tried laying on it and we would never make it. Overall for what we paid I’m pretty happy with it. Super easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Marcimg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for studio apartments or dorms.
customer_reviews.text: Good length I'm 6 ft and fit on it completely. It's a bit stiff at first but it will probably break in well. It's still comfortable and my dog likes it so that's a plus. But dont let that be a deciding factor cause hell sleep on concrete if you let him
customer_reviews.author: bellyoflead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small apartments + affordable
customer_reviews.text: Comfort level is better than I personally expected, but just above average. The look and feel of the couch is modern and fits into our micro living room in San Francisco. Assembly was very VERY easy. Recommend if it fits specific needs (Space, Money, Modern Grey Appearance-matched decor)
customer_reviews.author: Allie Kall

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couch that would be both couch and sleeper. I don’t have a lot of disposable income, so I looked for the best option that wasn’t going to break the bank. While this is a bit too firm for my taste, it does seem to be sturdy enough to withstand being a couch and an occasional sleeper. I have seen others comment that the springs wore out in theirs after only a few months of use - I hope that is not the case, as I really don’t want to have to replace or repair it the same year I bought it. I got a memory foam pad and has helped with the comfort when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, don't plan to binge watch Netflix on it though
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture, and was so easy to assemble. Its definitely for looks and not for comfort, but it suited our purpose well as an office couch. I'll use it to lounge while chatting on the phone or reading a book and its plenty comfortable for that, but its not what I would choose to cuddle up for a movie on. We haven't had anyone sleep on it yet, but we plan to put down some additional padding when we do. I love the way it looks, the fabric is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase again. May be Ok to have in a game/play room for kids or maybe Ok for a college student, but not as furniture in a adult’s home. Extremely uncomfortable. Hardly any cushion. Embarrassed to have guests sit on it. I don’t see it lasting beyond 3-6 months before completely losing its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Futon was easy to assemble. Looks and feels much more expensive than it is! It’s firm but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Park

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but you get what you pay for when it comes to comfort. You can feel most of the springs when you sit on them. It worked for my apartment while I was in grad school and needed something cheap for when people came to visit but wouldn’t recommend otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable futon
customer_reviews.text: This product came flat packed and was very quick and easy to assemble. I did it myself within 10 mins. It is very sturdy and can take up to 600lbs in weight. It is very firm to sleep on, so it's actually very good if you have back problems. I put the futon in my guest bedroom and they have found it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent couch for the price. When laid flat, the futon will tilt to one side if applied too much pressure. So only sleep-able for 1 but they must stay on one side of the futon. Might as well leave the one side up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn d

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: Can't use it as a bed. It's not balanced so it will tip over if you lay on the one side. Not that comfortable as a couch either. Will have to purchase mattress toppers and its not worth the 200 bucks. On the plus side, it was easy to assemble and it hasn't broken after 2 years. You could do worse but you could a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Futon/Sofa Bed
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I needed when I moved into my new place! I was able to assemble the futon within the day that it arrived and it is comfortable enough to sleep on. The futon is a nice size and is easy to clean, I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wanye

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable enough to lay on if your joints are still juicy but I wouldn't flop down on it, especially if the flopper weighs more than 100 lbs. The fabric is not linen but linen like as it is synthetic.
customer_reviews.author: StacyLATL

customer_reviews.title: Couch is sunken after ONE WEEK of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this couch about a week ago hoping my friend could sleep comfortably on it for a while. Within one week it has sunken and is extremely hollow and uncomfortable. Just from one week of use. So disappointed and wish I could have my money back. But the hassle of packing it and returning it is too much. I’m now stuck with a futon that has wear and tear from ONE WEEK of use.
customer_reviews.author: Varsha

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: We ended up buying this futon because it is too complicated to fit a full sized couch in our basement. We also couldn't find actual 2 piece sectionals that would fit. This futon looks great and was super simple to put together. It isn't the most comfortable thing but for the smaller amount of time we will use it. it works great!
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Great couch!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for the room we have it in, great packaging, little heavy/awkward to bring upstairs, but we made it happen!!! Great sturdiness, firm, well put together for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable futon! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The futon is amazing! Super comfortable, really easy to unpack and light in weight. My boyfriend is 6'4" and he comfortably can lay down and nap. The futon unfolds back, there are legs hidden inside the back of each seat so there is no way it can tip over. Amazing futon for a good price. Perfect for apartment living. Very satisfied!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for: Perfect for a first place
customer_reviews.text: The couch is firm and doesn't feel super high quality, but it looks super stylish. For living in my second apartment it's perfect. Also folds up which is nice for moving. Assembly is easy and a one person job, probably around 45min.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's perfect for my office! It took me 30 minutes to put together, which was only taking out of box and screwing in legs and arms. Very easy directions! Came packaged very well!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonKT

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person (gray version)
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this futon. I'm 5'7" and fit on it fine. Some reviews say that it tips with the back down. There are legs that fold out on the back cushion (they're hidden so unzip the back cushions). It's modern and looks great in a loft. It's the most comfy futon I've ever sat on and an awesome price. Shipped quickly and wasn't too difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morson

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product. However
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a great product. However, it's not comfortable for long sitting sessions, and your butt will hurt if you stay sat in it for more than 30 minutes. It's very, very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Drekly

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, right? If you are buying a $200-something sofa, don't expect it to feel high-end. This sofa serves its purpose perfectly in my home office, while remaining available for extra guests to sleep on. It's lightweight so it moves around a bit when you sit on it. The firmness is fine. I've sat on it for hours and not had any discomfort - it's firm though and it's not cushy by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Horrific joke
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever. The back doesnt stay in place so they fall straight to bed position and even when you have it in bed position the legs for the backs are a joke. Literal joke. My kids have fallen off this couch multiple times cause the back legs give out and the entire thing flips side ways. Whatever company made this shouldnt make literally anything ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Micah J.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had spent more for a higher quality Futon because I will be replacing it soon. It is too firm and easy to feel the metal frame. Not comfortable! It looks nice, but is not functional.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Love this couch
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch! Put it together by myself in half an hour. Easy instructions. I'm 6ft and easily fit within the armrests when laying down. Not something I would sleep on daily but nice for a nap in your living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern
customer_reviews.text: Very stylist and modern. To sit on the futon it’s great and I love that it’s not bulky. Obviously if you want a comfortable futon to sleep on, you could get one that’s bulky. This is great to use in a room you don’t need to sleep on it often. For guests coming, this is ideal. Easy to open & close. You can always add an egg crate if a guest needs a softer base to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn't do it justice. It's comfortable and the color is rich.
customer_reviews.author: Beauti withn

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa for price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sofa for under $280 dlls Comfortable (firm). 30 min to assemble (solo). Funky new smell. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Fauscama

customer_reviews.title: Cute & affordable.
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap sofa it’s great! I love the simple look. It was great for my very small apartment. It isn’t the most comfortable but cozy throw pillows fixed that. I would recommend to anyone looking for an affordable sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Arm broke after the new year. Not sturdy, and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles in fabric and broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: The futon would be a lot more attractive if there were not so many wrinkles in the fabric. This makes it look really cheap. In addition, the zipper on the bottom was broken and we had to safety pin it closed. If it were not such a pain to rebox it and send it back, I would have for these two reasons. I plan to write DHP products and will update the review if their customer service takes care of the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Stallman

customer_reviews.title: Got damaged fast
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t even had a sofa for a full year and the cushion got deformed in such a weird way looks like there was springs inside and they got bent or out of place. We only had people sleep on there for 3 days and then that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Haruka

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really elevated our living room esthetics. The other reviews were spot on sayings it’s not super comfy but add few 26x26 pillows and recline that baby and your set! Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa o

customer_reviews.title: came well protected in heavy duty box
customer_reviews.text: open and assembled quicker using my own tools, it comes with basic tools, but a 1/2" deep socket made it much easier...well made and looks great...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Arp

customer_reviews.title: I found this couch and it's the perfect fit and super functional for the small space
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are remodeling a travel trailer. I found this couch and it's the perfect fit and super functional for the small space. I really love the way this couch looks. Unfortunately I pulled it out into sleeper mode and slept on it for the first time last night and it's sooooo uncomfortable! I'll have to get some kind of extra pad to put over it and it's really to bad. Looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Sommerville

customer_reviews.title: it fits the space well and looks great. for stars only because it could be more ...
customer_reviews.text: husband and i bought this futon to go under our loft bed, giving us a little space to relax underneath. it fits the space well and looks great. for stars only because it could be more comfortable, but it isn't bad. best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for price
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected . Only took thirty minutes to assemble. It’s firm but comfortable. Also has zipper compartments underneath that you can store sheets in.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughters room so we can sleep in there when we have guests over... It’s not the most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept on but it looks great as a couch and it does the job as a bed!
customer_reviews.author: raeganne

customer_reviews.title: great sleeper for one person
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous futon, great sleeper for one person... not so much for two. Even with a topper.
customer_reviews.author: McKay

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Someone was sitting on the couch and scooched backward and the entire back leg just buckled and ripped through the bottom of the couch. When we looked at what broke it was held by a 1x1 and not sturdy at all. Would not recommend buying this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wince

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting less!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some negative reviews I was hesitant to purchase this couch. But I figured it was worth a shot for the price. What I was expecting was a hard, thin, narrow couch. What I got: semi firm, wide couch. I'm surprised at the size for the price. Took about an hour to assemble. I have not tried out the bed as I haven't had a reason to. I would say for the price it is a good couch. It's not that uncomfortable and nothing some pillows can't fix. Overall not as bad as I had expected. You can fit 3 adults pretty comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P

customer_reviews.title: Good for an office
customer_reviews.text: Not really good for a family. Not as sturdy, but it does look good.
customer_reviews.author: D. VanDale

customer_reviews.title: This is a great futon/couch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had, was how long it took to get it. Once I did, it was easy to assemble and a good value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Sole

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wow..easy to assemble. Good quality. Great purchase for kids spare room. Ex
customer_reviews.author: Madbeachfla

customer_reviews.title: It looks really sharp!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love the look and the design. If you need to move it, you can remove the arm rests and it folds into a nice square. Also, underneath is zippered storage for the protective covers it arrived with, and that's where they put the instructions for assembly just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! It’s difficult to find a futon with arm rests so I was happy to come across this one. It’s pretty comfortable and the material is really easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a kids playroom couch. It lasted four months until one of the legs broke off on a corner. The screw point for the legs is made of cheap particle board and not supported well. I will be re building the corner to get what I can out of the couch until a replacement can be found.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together. I really love the linen look. However, it is not the most comfortable after sitting for a while. I love how long it is; it can fit about three people comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great, and the instructions were excellent. I put it together by myself, but I needed someone else just to help me turn it over. Great looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tonkin

customer_reviews.title: The assembly extras are inside the zipper of the couch cushions.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love how it turned out. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because the extra assembly pieces were almost hidden in the cushions. The arm rests aren’t the most comfortable, but they aren’t uncomfortable. The couch itself is quite comfy. It took me about 45mins to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea Fabri

customer_reviews.title: Modern, comfortable and great value
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a guest studio. It came quickly and my husband assembled it by himself. Looks great in the space and we've received several compliments. Our teen has laid on it for several hours and finds it to be comfortable with the pillows we got. Crossing our fingers that it will last a while. It is great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brice

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if looking for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t imagine a less comfortable piece of furniture. I’ve had it for appx 6 months and I absolutely can not wait for the last payment to go thru so I can justify getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is great! We'll see how long it lasts, but it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: MattyPDX

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable to sit on. Pretty much impossible to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Cushions are very firm
customer_reviews.text: For the price this very good. The cushions are very firm so if you're looking for a soft couch do not buy. Otherwise no criticism
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brickner

customer_reviews.title: Cute Not Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t stress this enough, do not purchase this couch for comfort. Purchased in March, spring busted (or something!) in June. Two person household, we don’t sleep on it, no kids. It’s difficult to lounge comfortably on, but it is aesthetically pleasing. Well, until it pops a spring.
customer_reviews.author: Shoegal

customer_reviews.title: Stands its purpose in our spare bedroom/second nursery.
customer_reviews.text: The Futon looks amazing but its not the most comfortable to sit on. There is no cushion when you sit down..the rounded seat just sort of caves when you sit. My husband laid on it and said its doable for a nights rest but you definitely don't want it for a long stay.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: From 1 to 10= 4
customer_reviews.text: Is a very chip quality.. on the pic look super good but after I sit on... mmm. It so comfy at all.. beautiful design and easy to put together cool the fabrics bat very chip quality for all the rest (ps: one off the screws was missing from the box)
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Product was nice and comfy for a while but slowly broke down. Eventually the frame cracked from normal use after almost a year. The seats lose a lot of comfort over time as well. Overall, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: very thin cushion
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap but decent looking futon couch. I don't see anyone could have a comfortable night sleep
customer_reviews.author: Ali R. Hangul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my living room!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice! And it’s the perfect size for my apartment, the only reason I gave it 4 stars rather than 5, is because it isn’t the comfiest futon in the world. Ha. But aside from that it is a wonderful addition to my living room, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McMasters

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great value for the price. I haven't slept in it yet, but it is comfortable to sit in. I just love the charcoal gray color w/ the fabric design on the back rest. It really makes this piece stand out in a room.
customer_reviews.author: christi coulson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking small space couch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking small space couch. We're using it in a spare bedroom we converted to a small TV Room, 13x10 and looks great in there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible couch. Broke after light use over 6 months. We heard a noise in the middle of the night from something in the couch popping and the next morning we saw that the seat on the right side was misshaped and odd. Then the bottom caved and there are staples that poke you. Tossing this out won’t be purchasing anything like this from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bethoulle

product_meta.title: DHP Paxson Convertible Futon Couch Bed with Linen Upholstery and Wood Legs - Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GrayDorel Home Products is committed to providing unique and functional furniture pieces at affordable prices. The Paxson Futon from DHP combines bold lines, low-profile shapes, and wood accents for a sleeper sofa with a retro-modern look that will look great in any living space. The gray linen upholstery with intricate diagonal stitching makes this stylish, comfortable piece a real mid-century must-have that is ideal for small spaces. The rounded solid wood legs add a touch of warmth and offer plenty of extra support. Padding is provided under the feet to keep your floors looking great. Plus, the split-back design of this sleeper sofa is made to offer each guest their own level of comfort, whether sitting up or lounging back. Or lay back the couch seat cushions to create a comfortable and cozy sleeping solution for family or guests. The Paxson Linen Futon assembles quickly and easily and has a weight limit of 600 pounds. Set up this futon in minutes—everything you need is inside the box. Once assembled, this futon couch measures 78.5" W x 33.5" D x 32" H. The sleeping dimensions measure 44" D x 23" H x 78.5" W.
